name: need for sleep (dodormeur)
description:
my participation to the ludum dare 50 !

As a worker in a big enterprise, you must submit a big report… But you are so tired…

To play, you will just need your keyboard. If it doesn’t work, click on the game, to make sure the events are captured by the game (and make sure that the intro cutscene is finished)

It’s a bit of test in interactive narration, we’ll see how this goes ^^
